properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 7 at 8:42PM PST until January 8 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Visibilities in dense fog ranging from 800 feet to as
low as 200 feet.

* WHERE...Fort Tejon area.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The California Highway Patrol reported a
visibility of less than one quarter of a mile along Lebec
Road. Low visibilities and hazardous driving conditions are
possible along Interstate 5 through the Grapevine.
properties.instruction:
Anticipate travel delays. If driving, slow down, use low beam
headlights, and leave keep plenty of distance between your
vehicle and the vehicle in front of you.

NWSheadline: A DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY MORNING
